about_the_game:
Operation Ascalon

A newly assembled task force is urgently deployed to the Middle Eastern theatre of war, assigned with averting an impending disaster. A massive horde of Reds is assaulting the strategically vital Suez Canal. The potential loss of this region poses a dire threat to the entire African continent, leaving little time for action. Echo Team will be sent on a dangerous mission deep behind enemy lines to give the Allied forces a fighting chance.

Key Features Of The DLC:

  • Uncover a new chapter in the game's story, featuring seven missions and four intense raids.
  • The Reds will, will pose more diverse and challenging threats, including new enemy types and structures.
  • A new tier of more advanced parts and weapons
    -55 New Mech Parts
    -42 New Weapons including Laser Cannons, Assault Rifles with attached grenade and rocket launchers, napalm grenades, Gatling guns, automatic howitzers,
    Beam Cannons, Flak Guns, Quad Cannons, and more
    -30 New Active and Passive Modules
    -15 New Equipment
  • Multiple New Enemy Types and Red Structures
  • Active Protection Systems
  • 4 New Raid maps
  • New set of upgrades.
  • New support modules to help turn the tide of combat, adding more depth to the gameplay.

Game-Enhancing Patch:

Complementing the DLC expansion, a free patch will be included, enhancing the core game experience in several areas:
  • Enhanced Gameplay and Performance Options: Customize your experience by fine-tuning the maximum number of enemies present on the battlefield, resulting in even grander and more spectacular clashes.
  • New Difficulty Options: allowing adjustments before each mission.
  • Battlegroup Upgrades: Strengthen your tanks and infantry fighting vehicles.
  • New epic Active Modules like airstrikes and missile strikes.
